amendment.description: Amendments sought to limit public housing authorities from charging more than $25 per month for minimum rents; and allow for hardship exemptions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting of two amendments offered en bloc to require local housing authorities to limit the minimum rents public housing authority's may charge to $25 per month, and to permit HUD to waive the minimum rent requirements in cases of severe hardship.

action.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendments (A017) Failed by voice vote.
